user.biography: Welcome to the official Instagram Account of the Office of His Holiness the 14th Dalai Lama.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Dalai Lama on July 20, 2021. May be an image of 1 person, standing, sky and mountain.

node.text: HHDL looking out over Kangra Valley during a break from monsoon rains at his residence in Dharamsala, HP, India. Photo by Tenzin Jamphel #dalailama

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Dalai Lama on April 26, 2021. May be an image of one or more people and outdoors.

node.text: HHDL exchanges early morning greetings with security personnel from the balcony of his residence in Dharamsala, HP, India. Photo by Tenzin Jamphel #dalailama

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Dalai Lama on March 15, 2021. May be an image of indoor.

node.text: HHDL at home praying as he does every day for the happiness of all sentient beings. In particular, he spends some time praying that the suffering that has come from Covid-19 pandemic will soon come to an end and that those who are sick will make a complete and swift recovery. Photo by Tenzin Jamphel #dalailama

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Dalai Lama on March 05, 2021. May be an image of one or more people.

node.text: HHDL receiving the first dose of COVID-19 vaccine at Zonal Hospital, Dharamsala, HP, India on March 6, 2021. Photo by Tenzin Choejor #dalailama

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Dalai Lama on January 10, 2021. May be an image of 1 person, sitting and outerwear.

node.text: Climate activist Greta Thunberg listens to HHDL make a point during their conversation about climate feedback loops at his residence in Dharamsala, HP, India on January 10, 2021. Photo by Tenzin Jamphel. #climatechangeart dalailama #gretathunberg #climatechange

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Dalai Lama on December 19, 2020. May be an image of one or more people, people standing, outerwear, tree and outdoors.

node.text: Under a bright blue sky HHDL trains his binoculars on the snow-capped peaks behind his residence in Dharamsala, HP, India on December 19, 2020. Photo by Tenzin Jamphel #dalailama

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Dalai Lama on December 10, 2020. May be an image of 1 person.

node.text: HHDL enjoys a light moment during teachings he was giving over the internet from his residence on December 10, 2020. Photo by Tenzin Jamphel #dalailama

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Dalai Lama on November 28, 2020. May be an image of one or more people, outerwear, nature, tree and mountain.

node.text: HHDL enjoying the view of fresh snow on the Dhauladhar mountains from the roof of his residence in Dharamsala, HP, India on November 27, 2020. Photo by Tenzin Jamphel. #dalailama

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Dalai Lama on November 05, 2020. May be an image of 1 person, sitting and outerwear.

node.text: HHDL reading from the text on the second of his virtual teachings requested by Russian Buddhists from his residence in Dharamsala, HP, India on November 6, 2020. Photo by Ven Tenzin Jamphel #dalailama

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Dalai Lama on October 02, 2020. May be an image of 1 person.

node.text: HHDL holds up for all to see the conch shell he retrieved from the vicinity of a cave in Central India in which Nagarjuna is said to have meditated during the first day of his virtual teaching from his residence in Dharamsala, HP, India on October 2, 2020. Photo by Ven Tenzin Jamphel #dalailama

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Dalai Lama on September 06, 2020. May be an image of 1 person.

node.text: HHDL speaking to a virtual audience on the final day of teachings by video link from his residence in Dharamsala, HP, India on September 6, 2020. Photo by Tenzin Phuntsok #dalailama

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Dalai Lama on August 12, 2020. May be an image of 2 people.

node.text: HHDL greeting young people from conflict areas as he arrives for his dialogue on Conflict, COVID and Compassion organized by the United States Institute of Peace (USIP) by video link from his residence in Dharamsala, HP, India on August 12, 2020. Photo by Ven Tenzin Jamphel #dalailama
